name: Chin chin
description:
Welcome to the party ! Don't forget that not to toast with someone who wants to toast with you is frowned upon. Also, the glasses are made of glass, so be careful. Controls Use the arrows to move the glass left, right, down and up. Use the crank to move back and forth. Note that the movements are faster when the glass is close to you.

This version of the game is playable on a computer but the game was designed to be played on the playdate.

the directional pad of the playdate is replaced by the keyboard arrows or the WASD/ZQSD keys

The crank is replaced by the mouse scroll wheel.

the A and B buttons simply become the A and B keys.

Credits

The game, its code and graphics are by Léon Lenclos / leonlenclos.net
The music is by Louis Pezet
The sound effects are from Joseph Sardin / lasonotheque.org
The game was coded with Löve 0.9.1 for the (Unofficial) Playdate Anticipation Jam.
